components.name: Motherboard
components.details: Main circuit board connecting all components.

components.name: RAM (Memory)
components.details: Provides temporary storage for active processes.

components.name: Storage
components.details: Options include SSDs for speed and HDDs for capacity.

components.name: GPU (Graphics Card)
components.details: Renders images and video for displays.

components.name: Power Supply Unit (PSU)
components.details: Converts AC to DC power for all parts.

components.name: Cooling System
components.details: Fans or liquid cooling to prevent overheating.

components.name: Case
components.details: Enclosure that houses and protects the components.

components.name: Additional Components
components.details: May include optical drives, sound cards, and network cards.

components.name: Operating System
components.details: Software that manages hardware and software resources.
